data.title: Weather in Vancouver in february: Temperature, Rainfall, Sunshine... for February 2025! - Canada
data.meta_description: Is the climate in Vancouver (in Canada) in february good? Discover the weather forecast in february 2025 to prepare your trip.
data.text:
Vancouver in february: average Weather, Temperature and Climate

Best time to go to Vancouver?

Weather in Vancouver in february 2025

The weather in Vancouver (British Columbia) in the month of february comes from statistical datas on the past years. You can view the weather statistics the entire month, but also by clicking on the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Vancouver in february

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Vancouver in february.

The climate of Vancouver in february is very bad

The weather in february in Vancouver (British Columbia) is wet (with 335mm of precipitation over 13 days). The weather is better from the previous month since in january it receives an average of 523mm of precipitation over 16 days.

The climate is rather cold around this city this month. Do not forget to cover yourself! The thermometer averaged maximum of 6°C. The minimum is 2°C. Thus, the mean temperature average on this month of february in Vancouver (British Columbia) is 4°C. These temperatures are far removed from those records observed in Vancouver (British Columbia) in the month of february with a maximum record of 13°C in 2010 and a minimum record of -13°C in 2011. You need to prepare to have about 8 days with temperatures below 0°C, or 28% of the month.

On average, in Vancouver (British Columbia), the days of february last 10:13. The sun rises at 07:21 and sets at 17:34.

Weather data for Vancouver in february:

Weather data for Vancouver for february are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Vancouver. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Vancouver can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Vancouver.
